/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of grandeur to the tall buildings that line the street. These buildings, painted in hues of red and white, rise majestically against the backdrop of a hazy sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Overhead, a bridge stretches across the street, connecting the two sides of the city. In the distance, the silhouette of mountains can be seen, providing a natural contrast to the urban landscape. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the architectural details of the buildings and the vibrancy of city life.
